post:
Dear friends!
=======

Our partner LeaseWeb recently opened new [VPS location in Singapore](http://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/66263/leaseweb-opened-vps-location-in-asia-sg-at-very-low-price)

We want to celebrate this event and provide our customers additional 10% discount on LeaseWeb Singapore VPS with yearly contracts.

* **S**   -  21.6 EUR/year  [Order Link](https://my.ru-tld.ru/manager/billmgr?func=register&welcomfunc=vds.order&welcomparam=price=3506&project=7) (regular LeaseWeb price 24 EUR/year)

**M, L and XL servers are also available with 10% discount.** 

To apply for discount use promocode **LowEndTalk**

VPS are provided with same specs as LeaseWeb's offer. 

Our billing panel is integrated with LeaseWeb API. You can reboot, set PTR or null route and control your bandwidth the same as well as in LeaseWeb control panel.

**Also we are ready to provide 10% discount on any of dedicated servers from [LeaseWeb's stock ](https://www.leaseweb.com/dedicated-servers/build-your-own)**

Contact our sales team via email [my@ru-tld.ru](my@ru-tld.ru) or via online chat on website https://ru-tld.ru/en

Please also check our dedicated servers promotions below.
Current dedicated server promotions:
=======

* **[US]** HP DL120G7/Intel Dual Core G850/4GB RAM/2x1Tb SATA2/**100TB/1Gbit**

    Special price: **29 EUR** [Order link](https://ru-tld.ru/en/aktsionnyie-servery/#2439)

* **[DE]** HP DL120G5/Intel Quad-Core Xeon X3210/8GB RAM/2x500GB SATA/100Mbit 5TB

    Special price: **29 EUR**
[Order link](https://ru-tld.ru/en/aktsionnyie-servery/#2415)

* **[NL]** Dell R210-II/Intel Quad-Core Xeon E3-1220/4GB RAM/2x1TB SATA/100Mbit

    Special price: **39 EUR**
[Order link](https://ru-tld.ru/en/aktsionnyie-servery/#2719)

* **[DE]** Dell R210-II/Intel Quad-Core Xeon E3-1220/8GB RAM/2x1TB SATA/100Mbit

    Special price: **39 EUR**
[Order link](https://ru-tld.ru/en/aktsionnyie-servery/#2450)

To apply for discount use promocode **LowEndTalk**
